zone.name: Virtual Private Cloud
zone.description: Isolated virtual network for AWS resources with full control over IP addressing, subnets, and routing

zone.name: Network Zone
zone.description: Generic network boundary for organizing services

zone.name: Network Zone
zone.description: Generic network boundary for organizing services

zone.name: Network Zone
zone.description: Generic network boundary for organizing services

zone.name: Network Zone
zone.description: Generic network boundary for organizing services

service.name: Vercel
service.description: Full-stack platform for frontend with serverless functions, edge runtime, and automatic CI/CD

costModel.assumptions: Hobby plan is free forever for personal projects. Pro plan starts at $20/mo + additional usage; estimate assumes low-to-moderate usage.

service.name: Clerk
service.description: User management and authentication with pre-built UI components, MFA, organizations, and enterprise SSO

costModel.assumptions: Free tier includes 10,000 MAUs.

zone.name: Public Subnet
zone.description: Subnet with route to Internet Gateway for public-facing resources

zone.name: Private Subnet
zone.description: Subnet without direct internet access for internal resources

service.name: Cloudflare CDN
service.description: Global content delivery network with 330+ data centers, unmetered DDoS protection, and edge caching

costModel.assumptions: CDN included in all plans. Free tier available. Pro at $20/mo (annual), Business at $200/mo (annual). CDN usage does not incur per-GB fees; higher tiers add security and performance features.

service.name: Cloudflare R2
service.description: S3-compatible object storage with zero egress fees and simple per-GB and per-request pricing

costModel.assumptions: Pricing includes $0.015/GB-month for Standard storage and $0.01/GB-month for Infrequent Access.

service.name: Neon
service.description: Serverless Postgres with instant branching, autoscaling, scale-to-zero, and bottomless storage

costModel.assumptions: Free plan includes 100 CU-hours per project, 0.5 GB storage.

service.name: MongoDB Atlas
service.description: Fully managed multi-cloud MongoDB database with automatic scaling, backups, vector search, and global distribution

costModel.assumptions: Free (M0) tier includes 512MB storage.

service.name: Stripe
service.description: Complete payment platform with APIs for online payments, subscriptions, invoicing, and financial services

costModel.assumptions: 2.9% + 30Â¢ for domestic cards.

service.name: Resend
service.description: Modern email API for developers with templates, analytics, multi-region delivery, and reliable infrastructure

costModel.assumptions: Free tier includes 3,000 emails/month.

service.name: Pusher Channels
service.description: Real-time WebSocket communication platform for building live features like chat, notifications, collaboration, and multiplayer experiences

costModel.assumptions: Free Sandbox plan includes 200k messages/day.

service.name: Inngest
service.description: Event-driven durable workflow engine with automatic retries, scheduling, fan-out patterns, and visual debugging

costModel.assumptions: Hobby plan includes 50k executions/month.

service.name: Sentry
service.description: Application monitoring and error tracking with real-time alerts, performance monitoring, release tracking, and detailed stack traces

costModel.assumptions: Developer plan includes 5k errors.

service.name: PostHog
service.description: Open-source product analytics platform with event tracking, session replay, feature flags, A/B testing, surveys, data pipelines, and AI tooling

costModel.assumptions: Free tier includes 1M analytics events.

service.name: AWS API Gateway
service.description: Fully managed service for building, deploying, and securing REST, HTTP, and WebSocket APIs at scale

costModel.assumptions: Free tier includes 1M REST calls, 1M HTTP calls, 1M WebSocket messages per month for 12 months.

service.name: AWS Application Load Balancer
service.description: Layer 7 load balancer for HTTP/HTTPS traffic with advanced routing, SSL termination, and health checks

costModel.assumptions: ALB pricing includes $0.0225 per ALB-hour plus $0.008 per LCU-hour.

service.name: AWS Lambda
service.description: Serverless compute service that runs code in response to events

costModel.assumptions: Free tier includes 1M requests and 400k GB-seconds per month.

service.name: AWS Fargate
service.description: Serverless compute engine for containers, billed per vCPU-second, GB-second, and storage

costModel.assumptions: Pricing is based on vCPU-seconds, GB-seconds, and additional ephemeral storage beyond the included 20GB.

service.name: AWS Fargate
service.description: Serverless compute engine for containers, billed per vCPU-second, GB-second, and storage

costModel.assumptions: Pricing is based on vCPU-seconds, GB-seconds.

service.name: AWS SQS
service.description: Fully managed message queue service for decoupling and scaling microservices

costModel.assumptions: Free tier includes 1M requests per month.

service.name: AWS ElastiCache Redis
service.description: Fully managed Redis-compatible in-memory cache with support for serverless, on-demand nodes, clustering, and data tiering

costModel.assumptions: Free Tier includes 750 hrs of cache.t3.micro.

service.name: AWS Secrets Manager
service.description: Securely store, rotate, and manage API keys, database credentials, and other secrets

costModel.assumptions: Pricing is $0.40 per secret per month.
